TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Help extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝 HTML Help 1.0 引擎。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTML Help 1.0 engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立的新執行個體類別。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要提供應用程式的說明，請呼叫靜態和方法。To provide Help for an application, call the static and methods. 您可以使用顯示編譯的說明檔案 (.chm) 或 HTML 說明格式的 HTML 檔案。You can use to show compiled Help files (.chm) or HTML files in the HTML Help format. 編譯的說明檔提供的內容、 索引、 搜尋功能和關鍵字網頁中的連結資料表。Compiled Help files provide a table of contents, an index, search capability, and keyword links in pages. 快速鍵只有在已編譯的說明檔。Shortcuts work only in compiled Help files. 您可以使用 HTML Help Workshop 產生 HTML 說明 1.x 檔案。You can generate HTML Help 1.x files by using HTML Help Workshop. 多個 HTML 說明檔的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 HTML Help Workshop 」 和其他 HTML 說明主題[Microsoft HTML 說明](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661)。For more information about HTML Help, see "HTML Help Workshop" and other HTML Help topics at [Microsoft HTML Help](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示表單，其中包含可用來與 Mspaint.chm 說明檔互動的三個按鈕。The following code example displays a form that contains three buttons that can be used to interact with the Mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕會顯示**Index** 索引標籤的 說明 檔案。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明** 按鈕會顯示內容說明檔案中根據值中選取**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字** 按鈕顯示內容中指定的說明檔根據關鍵字**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 比方說，若要顯示橢圓形說明 頁面的索引值，請選取中的值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明** 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示 「 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題關鍵字，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊中，然後按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例會使用方法，以顯示不同的說明索引標籤和 [說明] 主題，而方法，以顯示 [說明] 索引。The example uses the method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the method to display the Help index. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Displays the contents of a Help file.

The path and name of the Help file.

summary.span: 在指定的 URL 顯示說明檔的內容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`引數可以是表單*C:\path\sample.chm*或是 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 如需格式的路徑的資訊，請參閱[在 Windows 系統上的檔案路徑格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

The path and name of the Help file.

param.span: 要為其顯示說明的關鍵字。

span.span: The keyword to display Help for.

summary.span: 顯示特定關鍵字在指定的 URL 中找到的說明檔內容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file found at the specified URL for a specific keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`引數可以是表單*C:\path\sample.chm*或是 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 如需格式的路徑的資訊，請參閱[在 Windows 系統上的檔案路徑格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 如果`keyword`是`null`，將會顯示說明檔的目錄。If `keyword` is `null`, the table of contents for the Help file will be displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示具有可用來與 mspaint.chm 說明檔互動的三個按鈕的表單。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕會顯示**Index** 索引標籤的 說明 檔案。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明** 按鈕會顯示內容說明檔案中根據值中選取**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字** 按鈕顯示內容中指定的說明檔根據關鍵字**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 比方說，若要顯示橢圓形說明 頁面的索引值，請選取中的值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明** 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示 「 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題關鍵字，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊中，然後按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例示範只呼叫方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`引數可以是表單*C:\path\sample.chm*或是 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 如需格式的路徑的資訊，請參閱[在 Windows 系統上的檔案路徑格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 編譯的說明檔提供的內容、 索引、 搜尋和網頁中的關鍵字連結的資料表。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用下列值`navigator`引數： ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for the `navigator` argument: , , , or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來開啟說明檔案至其 [索引] 頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to open a Help file to its index page. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼包含名為按鈕的表單`Button2`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button2`. summary.span: 顯示 URL 中使用者提供的說明檔內容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file located at the URL supplied by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`引數可以是表單*C:\path\sample.chm*或是 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 如需格式的路徑的資訊，請參閱[在 Windows 系統上的檔案路徑格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 編譯的說明檔會提供網頁中資料表的內容、 索引、 搜尋和關鍵字的連結。Compiled Help files provide table-of-contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 您可以使用`parameter`引數提供的其他改良， ， ，或命令。You can use the `parameter` argument to provide additional refinement of the , , , or command. 如果在指定的值`command`引數， ，或，這個值應該是空字串 (""，或)。If the value specified in the `command` argument is , , or , this value should be an empty string ("", or ). 如果`command`引數參考， ， ，或，這個值應該是字串，包含的主題名稱或要顯示之主題的關鍵字或數值識別碼。If the `command` argument references , , , or , this value should be a string that contains the topic name, or the keyword or numeric identifier of the topic to display. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示具有可用來與 mspaint.chm 說明檔互動的三個按鈕的表單。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **顯示說明索引**按鈕會顯示**Index** 索引標籤的 說明 檔案。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **顯示說明** 按鈕會顯示內容說明檔案中根據值中選取**說明導覽**清單。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **顯示關鍵字** 按鈕顯示內容中指定的說明檔根據關鍵字**關鍵字**文字方塊。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 比方說，若要顯示橢圓形說明 頁面的索引值，請選取中的值**說明導覽**下拉式清單中，輸入**橢圓形**中**參數**文字方塊，然後再按一下**顯示說明** 按鈕。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要顯示 「 若要繪製的筆刷 」 說明主題關鍵字，請輸入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**關鍵字**文字方塊中，然後按一下**顯示關鍵字** 按鈕。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此範例示範只呼叫方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 請參閱類別的完整程式碼範例的概觀。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#3)]

static member ShowPopup : System.Windows.Forms.Control * string * System.Drawing.Point -> unit

param.name: parent
param.span: 識別 [說明] 對話方塊父代的 。

span.span: A that identifies the parent of the Help dialog box.

param.name: caption
param.span: 要在快顯視窗中顯示的訊息。

span.span: The message to display in the pop-up window.

param.name: location
param.span: 指定要顯示快顯視窗處之水平和垂直座標的值，這個值是相對於螢幕左上角指定的。

span.span: A value that specifies the horizontal and vertical coordinates at which to display the pop-up window, relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

summary.span: 顯示 [說明] 快顯視窗 (Pop-Up Window)。

span.span: Displays a Help pop-up window.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件類別，以顯示快顯樣式協助使用者。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user.
